Package io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.generator

JWT generator configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccessRefreshTokenGenerator
    Contract to generate AccessRefreshToken for a particular user.
    AccessTokenConfiguration
    Configuration for access tokens.
    JwtGeneratorConfiguration Deprecated
    Use AccessTokenConfiguration) instead.
    RefreshTokenConfiguration
    Configuration for the SignedRefreshTokenGenerator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessTokenConfigurationProperties
    Access token configuration.
    DefaultAccessRefreshTokenGenerator
    Generates http responses with access and refresh token.
    JwtGeneratorConfigurationProperties Deprecated
    Use AccessTokenConfigurationProperties instead.
    JwtTokenGenerator
    JWT Token Generation.
    RefreshTokenConfigurationProperties
    ConfigurationProperties implementation of RefreshTokenConfiguration to configure SignedRefreshTokenGenerator.
    SignedRefreshTokenGenerator
    The default implementation of RefreshTokenGenerator and RefreshTokenValidator.

Package io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.generator Description

JWT generator configuration.
